## Description {#details}

This class implements the register bank concept.

Two instances of <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/registerbank">RegisterBank</a> must have different <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#abdf8cf606905c10634e831390981b0ed">ID</a>. This property is enforced by the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/registerbankinfo">RegisterBankInfo</a> class.

Definition at line 28 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/registerbank-h">RegisterBank.h</a>.

### covers() {#aa0393eeb48bb9235b4fc40b19ebb52f1}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool RegisterBank::covers (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetregisterclass">TargetRegisterClass</a> &amp; RC) const</>}>
<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/check">Check</a> whether this register bank covers <code>RC</code>.

In other words, check if this register bank fully covers the registers that <code>RC</code> contains.

### print() {#a2f200a149ac3e8669bb616c3b1049ecf}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void RegisterBank::print (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream">raw&#95;ostream</a> &amp; OS, bool IsForDebug=false, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetregisterinfo">TargetRegisterInfo</a> &#42; TRI=nullptr) const</>}>
Print the register mask on OS.

If IsForDebug is false, then only the name of the register bank is printed. Otherwise, all the fields are printing. TRI is then used to print the name of the register classes that this register bank covers.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/registerbank-h/#l00079">79</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/registerbank-h">RegisterBank.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/registerbank-cpp/#l00071">71</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/registerbank-cpp">RegisterBank.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### verify() {#a29b158112720b57e5aa9898944c69330}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool RegisterBank::verify (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/registerbankinfo">RegisterBankInfo</a> &amp; RBI, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetregisterinfo">TargetRegisterInfo</a> &amp; TRI) const</>}>
<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/check">Check</a> if this register bank is valid.

In other words, if it has been properly constructed.


:::info
This method does not check anything when assertions are disabled.
:::


<SectionUser title="Returns">
True is the check was successful.
</SectionUser>
